monday.title: Booty + Legs
monday.note: Soft start into the week, focus on glutes and legs.

tuesday.title: Core (Abs Focus)
tuesday.note: Short but spicy abs session, no equipment needed.

wednesday.title: Full Body Stretch
wednesday.note: Gentle full-body stretch to reset and recover.

thursday.title: Upper Body (Back + Arms)
thursday.note: Improve posture and tone your back and arms.

friday.title: Full Body Low Impact HIIT
friday.note: Sweaty but joint-friendly, no-jump full body burn.

saturday.title: Light Movement / Morning Stretch
saturday.note: Soft morning stretch to wake up your body.

sunday.title: Full Rest
sunday.note: Full rest day. Your muscles grow while you chill.
